translationManagement.manageAutoTranslations: Manage auto-translations for your products, services, and categories
translationManagement.automaticTranslationDescription: When you create content in one language, our system automatically translates it to the other language using Google Translate.
translationManagement.reviewProcessDescription: Auto-translated content is marked as "Pending" and needs your review before being shown to customers.
translationManagement.editAndApproveDescription: You can edit translations to improve accuracy before approving them for public display.
translationManagement.fallbackSystemDescription: If a translation isn't approved, customers will see the original language content instead.

landing.bestAutoWorkshop: Best Auto Workshop In Your Area
landing.wrenchExDescription: WrenchEX is a leading auto workshop specializing in hybrid and conventional vehicles. With expert mechanics and modern tools, we deliver reliable on-site maintenance and the best service experience.

whyChooseUs.bestAutoWorkshop: Best Auto Workshop In Your Area
whyChooseUs.wrenchExDescription: WrenchEX is a leading auto workshop specializing in hybrid and conventional vehicles. With expert mechanics and modern tools, we deliver reliable on-site maintenance and the best service experience.
whyChooseUs.bestEquipmentDesc: We've invested in the most up-to-date diagnostic equipment, tools and software designed particularly for your vehicle needs.
whyChooseUs.professionalStandardsDesc: Our car repair facility can work on a wide range of vehicles. We only conduct the work that is required to resolve your issue.
whyChooseUs.expertTeamDesc: We are one of the leading auto workshop serving customers. All mechanical work performed by expert mechanics.
whyChooseUs.fullServiceFacilityDesc: From fine-tuning engines to tackling major repairs, our Full Auto Servicing Facility ensures your vehicle runs smoothly every mile.
whyChooseUs.genuinePartsDesc: Find peace of mind knowing that only genuine parts are available at our garage. Quality guaranteed for all repairs.
whyChooseUs.readyToExperience: Ready to Experience the Best Auto Service?
whyChooseUs.readyToExperienceDesc: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us with their vehicle maintenance and repairs.

mapsSection.discoverTrustedShops: Discover trusted auto parts stores and service providers in your area. Get directions, compare services, and connect with local mechanics.
mapsSection.enableLocation: Enable Location to See Nearby Shops
mapsSection.localAutoPartsStoresDesc: Find genuine and aftermarket parts from verified sellers in your neighborhood.
mapsSection.professionalServicesDesc: Book appointments with certified mechanics and service centers near you.
mapsSection.easyNavigationDesc: Get turn-by-turn directions to any shop or service provider with real-time traffic updates.
mapsSection.verifiedReviewsDesc: Read authentic reviews from real customers to make informed decisions about your auto needs.
mapsSection.competitivePricingDesc: Compare prices and find the best deals on auto parts and services in your area.
mapsSection.expertSupportDesc: Get professional advice and support from certified mechanics and auto experts.
mapsSection.browseCompleteCatalog: Browse our complete catalog of products and services, or use our advanced search to find exactly what you're looking for.

smartReview.productReviewMessage: To review this product, you need to chat with the seller first. Start a conversation by asking questions about the product, and after exchanging 5+ messages, you'll be able to leave a review.
smartReview.productReviewAction: Start chatting with the seller to unlock review access
smartReview.bookServiceFirst: Book and complete the service first!
smartReview.serviceReviewMessage: To review this service, you need to book an appointment and complete the service. After your appointment is marked as completed, you'll have 60 days to leave a review.
smartReview.serviceReviewAction: Book this service to unlock review access
smartReview.shopReviewMessage: To review this shop, you need to have some interaction first. You can either chat about products or book a service. After any meaningful interaction, you'll be able to rate the overall shop experience.
smartReview.shopReviewAction: Chat about products or book services to unlock review access
smartReview.appointmentReviewMessage: You can only review appointments that have been completed. Once your appointment is finished, you'll be able to rate the service experience.
smartReview.appointmentReviewAction: Complete your appointment to unlock review access
smartReview.chatReviewMessage: To review the chat experience, you need to have exchanged at least 5 messages with the seller. Continue your conversation to unlock review access.
smartReview.chatReviewAction: Exchange more messages to unlock review access
smartReview.defaultMessage: You need to interact with this item first before leaving a review.
smartReview.pleaseLoginToReview: Please log in to write a review

productDetail.WrenchEXConnectsBuyersAndSellersDirectly: WrenchEX connects buyers and sellers directly.
productDetail.ChatSecurelyWithinTheAppToDiscussProduct: Chat securely within the app to discuss product details, pricing, and pickup or delivery options.
productDetail.BuyersAndSellersAreResponsibleForArrangi: Buyers and sellers are responsible for arranging payment and item exchange.
productDetail.NoOfficialShippingServiceIsProvidedByWre: No official shipping service is provided by WrenchEX.
productDetail.SellersMayChooseToOfferPickupLocalDelive: Sellers may choose to offer pickup, local delivery, or courier services at their own discretion.
productDetail.AlwaysConfirmDeliveryMethodAndCostDirect: Always confirm delivery method and cost directly with the seller before making a deal.
productDetail.WrenchEXDoesNotHandleReturnsOrRefunds: WrenchEX does not handle returns or refunds.
productDetail.BuyersShouldCarefullyInspectItemsAndConf: Buyers should carefully inspect items and confirm details before purchase.
productDetail.AnyDisputesMustBeResolvedDirectlyBetween: Any disputes must be resolved directly between buyer and seller.
productDetail.WrenchEXEncouragesSafeHonestAndTranspare: WrenchEX encourages safe, honest, and transparent communication.

help.title: Help & Contact
help.subtitle: We're here to help! Get in touch with our support team or find answers to common questions.
help.faq1Question: How do I create an account?
help.faq1Answer: Click on 'Sign Up' in the top right corner, fill in your details, and verify your email address.
help.faq2Question: How can I sell my products?
help.faq2Answer: Create a seller account, complete your profile, and start listing your automotive products & services.
help.faq3Question: How do I complete a deal on WrenchEX?
help.faq3Answer: Simply chat with the seller to discuss details and agree on the exchange. Once both parties are satisfied, you can meet or arrange pickup directly.
help.subject: Subject
help.enterMessage: Tell us how we can help you...
help.messageSentDescription: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
